short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mess is a dirty word. Use this extension to help you clean your own ****. You're welcome. - Wet Ones

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mess is a dirty word. New moms and on-the-go travelers have to deal with two major issues: messes, and cleaning out their own potty mouths. Why not use both to Wet Ones' advantage?

Wet Ones created this to help you clean up your ****. Never see the "m" word ever again.
